traits.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

actions.name: Beak
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage.
